sentences.en: " It will be nice to make some money, or is that a heap of garbage ? "
sentences.cn: 挣些钱是挺不错的, 这可不是在说 废话 吧 ?

sentences.en: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.cn: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

sentences.en: Don't scatter garbage all over the place.
sentences.cn: 不要随地乱扔果皮纸屑.

sentences.en: Don't talk such a load of garbage!
For all intents and purposes, these things are garbage.
sentences.cn: 无论从哪点来看, 这些东西都是废物.

sentences.en: Garbage from food can be changed into fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 食物下脚可以变成肥料.

sentences.en: He talked a lot of garbage on the subject.
sentences.cn: 关于这个问题,他讲了许多废话.

sentences.en: I personally think this is complete garbage.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为这纯粹是废话。

sentences.en: I've never heard such a load of garbage!
sentences.cn: 这麽胡说八道我还从来没听说过!

sentences.en: In her home, garbage was fed to the pigs.
sentences.cn: 在她家, 剩菜用来喂猪.

sentences.en: Men don't buy the Florence Nightingale garbage they teach in nursing school.
sentences.cn: 男性不会接受护理学校传授的弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔那陈旧的一套.

sentences.en: Much of their furniture was scavenged from other people's garbage.
sentences.cn: 他们的家具许多都是从别人扔掉的东西中捡来的。

sentences.en: Our teacher also taught us about how garbage is recycled.
sentences.cn: 老师给我们讲了废品是怎样再生的.

sentences.en: Please keep the place clean, and throw away any garbage.
sentences.cn: 请保持地方清洁, 并于使用后把所有废物带离中心.

sentences.en: The matter cycle implies that the natrual ecosystem never produces garbage.
sentences.cn: 分解者:主要指细菌、真菌等.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 清除垃圾的人；清洁工
无用输入；无用数据输入
无用输入无用输出; 废料入废料出（用于计算机和其他领域，表示错误的或质量较差的计算机输入会导致输出有误）

trans.tran_en: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away
